name: Tom and Jerry
description:
Based on MGM's world-known cartoon, the player controls Jerry, the Mouse (in 2-Player Mode, P2 will control Jerry's nephew, Tuffy) as he explores four different worlds (movie theater, junkyard, a toy-based stage and the house inner). Game controls are simple: B Button makes Jerry/Tuffy to jump (tapping it again lightly upon landing will activate their Super Jumps), while A/Y/X Buttons will make them to throw marbles upward (Y Button) and downward (X/Y Buttons) in the enemies.

To earn extra lives throughout the game, players have two available options: the rarest and, sometimes, hardest way is to find a 1-Up icon; however, the easiest mode is to collect 100 of small balls of cheese scattered throughout the levels (Cheese Bits). Also, Jerry and Tuffy's health meters are displayed in the form of four hearts, that can be replenished through collectible larger cheese wedges (Cheese Chunks). At the end of each world, Jerry and Tuffy will take a confrontation with Tom, the Cat.

shot.caption: Title screen / Main menu.
Stage screen view.
Jumping across the lights of the marquee sign, Jerry is about to collect cheese bits and a marble!
Jerry takes the ground rote and, aiming to reach the top, he jumps in direction to a floating brick.
While explores the current stage, Jerry finds an octopus-like enemy: he decided to marble-defeat it!
While Jerry thinks in a mode to cross the other side and continue, two butterflies pass above him...
Jerry in the movie theater: now, he's using a ticket-stub-cum-surfboard to attack some cockroaches.
Inside of an area full of crates, Jerry meets Tom: the feline attacks dropping sandbags randomly.
Jerry goes to explore a big junkyard: now, he uses a floating deflated tire to reach the top floor.
While Jerry crosses a row of ledges, he must be quick to not be hit-damaged by a falling fish spine!
Some open-ended pipes are dripping green slime in Jerry's way: he just waits a chance to go ahead...
After some exploration, Jerry finds a crane: he uses it to access a path with lots of Cheese Bits!
Appealing for his marbles again, Jerry jumps and reaches enough height to attack a muscled mouse.
Through a magnetic crane, Tom attempts to hit-attack a crouched Jerry bringing three walking rivets.
Before to collect lots of Cheese Bits, Jerry must defeat two rolling robots: it will be more safe...
Making his way through some bouncy balls, Jerry must be careful with certain rocket-like dangers...
This time, Jerry reaches a medium-range platform and, suddenly, he's back-damaged by an enemy tank.
Through a clockwise-circling platform, Jerry finds the 1-Up icon and waits the best moment to jump.
Luckily, Jerry jump-avoids more robots and reaches another bouncy ball: time to more cheese stuff!
Suddenly, a rocket hit-damages Jerry! But a Cheese Chunk is the best solution to fix this fault...
Jerry moves to a place with ground buttons: it's time to plan a new mode to re-defeat Tom, the Cat!
Jerry The Mouse's adventure continues, this time in a kitchen with lots of walk-pestering foodstuff!
In an attempt to hit-defeat one of the current enemies (cockroach and spinning rabbit), Jerry jumps.
Finally! After having avoid the menaces of a living kitchen, Jerry reaches the "Level Clear" sign...
Next place to explore: a room! This time, Jerry is about to catch a Cheese Chunk near Tom's photo...
While Jerry walks over a row of books, he finds a marble and a minor row of small cheese balls...
Now, Jerry falls into an aquarium: through this short section, he must swim-avoid its inhabitants!
Jerry throws a marble in direction to Tom's face, and he strikes back with a quick-hand-claw attack.
Jerry's marble throwing continues: now, the current target is a cockroach... or a pestering spider?
Meanwhile, Tom's hand blindly attempts to grab Jerry, but the mouse is located in a safe distance...
